text.section: Notwithstanding other provisions to the contrary, the Department of Corrections may contract with a county fiscal court or local or regional correctional authority to house misdemeanants and persons awaiting trial or sentencing.
The provisions of this section shall not apply to any institution, home, or agency which does not receive aid from the state, a county, or municipality.
